file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 12-21-10-03 - REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT DOOR - SERVICING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL REAR ELECTRONIC COMPARTMENT DOOR - SERVICING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to lubricate the Rear-Electronic-Compartment Door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY REAR-ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT ALL 12-21-10-600-801-A DOOR - LUBRICATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 12-21-10 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 12-21-10-600-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. REAR-ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - LUBRICATION A. General (1) This procedure helps the door internal mechanism to operate correctly and the door to move freely. This makes the opening/closing operations easier. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION REAR ELECTRONIC-COMPARTMENT DOOR - RE- AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/400 MOVAL C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 272DR Fuselage Rear Section I D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To lubricate the rear electronic compartment Brush AR available door F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL-G-23827 Grease AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear-electronic-compartment door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove rear-electronic compartment door 272DR ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/ 400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-21-10 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Lubrication (Figure 301) SUBTASK 610-002-A (1) Lubricate the latch pins. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install rear-electronic compartment door 272DR ( AMM TASK 52-44-01-000-801-A/ 400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 600-801-A/300 12-21-10 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
